message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'm willing to share 90% with you. We can negotiate further if you prefer.
I'm not greedy, but I think I deserve more for taking the risk of negotiating with you!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think my initial offer was fair. Let's meet in the middle.
I'm not backing down. You're getting a smaller share, but it's still a generous offer.

Let's be reasonable. I'm offering you more than your last proposal. I'm willing to go lower if we need to, but we're getting close to the end of the game and I don't want to lose out on any of the money.
I'm not giving up yet. You're getting a tiny share, but I'm willing to take the risk of losing out on more.
We're running out of time! I'm offering you half, which is more than you've gotten so far. Let's end this before we both lose everything.
